featured.text: The Amazons are completely dependent on their slaves ____(29)___ their sharp jaws, so well suited for fighting, are useless in taking care of larvae or for digging.
Physically, Peter is well-built, yet , he is very weak and dependent.
Today, all countries are involved in, and to varying degrees dependent on, trade with other countries.

definition.zh_def: 依賴他人或事物的，無法獨立的。
definition.en_def: Relying on someone or something else; unable to exist or function independently.
definition.example: She is financially dependent on her parents while she finishes her studies.
